decision_conditions: Works agreed to tree GROUP labelled G2
Works agreed to tree labelled T1
Works agreed to tree labelled T5
Works agreed to tree labelled T4
Works agreed to tree GROUP labelled G3
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T1- Strawberry TreeReduce by 2-3 foot and thin out 10-15% of internal stems. Final height 3m and spread 2.5mG2- Himalayan Birch3 x trees - Crown Thin - Removing selected branches in the upper canopy to reduce current density by up to 15%. Remove crossing, weak and suppressed branches. Remove selected lower branches in agreement with client to achieve crown lift. Final height and spread unchangedG3- Beech & Judas TreeCrown Thin Beech tree - Removing epicormic growth through centre of crown. Remove selected lower branches in agreement with client to achieve crown lift and clearance from Judas tree. Final height and spread unchangedSelective, light crown reduction of Judas tree to clear from Beech. T4- PittosporumReduce height by 4-5 foot. Trim/reduce spread to create mushroom shaped crown. Final height 4m and spread 4mT5-PittosporumTrim to tidy and contain, remove deadwood. Very lightly prune crab apple away from pittosporum, balancing on opposite side if necessary. Final height and spread unchangedGeneral Maintenance.
